# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

1. **For iron-steel complex integrated with mining of Mutun hematite deposit:** Bolivian contact is Major Carlos Morales, President of Empresa Siderurgica Nacional S.A. (SIDERSA) with office in Ministerio de Mineria y Metalurgia, 1769 Av. 16 de Julio, La Paz, Bolivia.
2. **For gas pipeline and fertilizer plant:** Bolivian contact is Rolando Prada, General Manager of Yacimientos Petroliferos Fiscales Bolivianos (Y.P.F.B.), Calle Bueno S/N, La Paz, Bolivia.
3. **For cement plant:** Juan Pereda Asbun, Ministro de Industria y Comercio, Av. Camacho/Bueno, La Paz, Bolivia.
Stedman
